title: Stranded
description: A group of people are marooned on a mysterious island that’s riddled with religious and scientific paradoxes. Flashbacks will raise more questions than they answer.
quote: Oh my god! Inside the coconut, my pet cat from when I was little. And on his nametage is the number of our flight!
altHero: four people with torches find a rock with cryptic etchings and a giant crank
alt1: the aftermath of a plane crash on a beach
alt2: a woman screams and man scream in terror
alt3: a cat emerges from a cracked coconut, its collar says “815”
alt4: a man looks on in horror as another man is taken away by a lava monster
